com.SoftWoehr.util
Interface verbose

All Known Implementing Classes:
ControlFlowElement, Definition, Desktop, engine, Error, Exceptions, FijiApplet, InnerInterpreter, interpreter, JavaParam, JTextAreaOutputStream, ParameterizedPrimitive, com.SoftWoehr.FIJI.base.desktop.shell.Primitive, SearchOrder, Semantic, ShellFrame, ShellTextArea, ShutdownHelper, SQLSession, TextAreaOutputStream, Value, Variable, Wordlist, GetArgs
public interface verbose

An interface so implementors can be tested for verbose mode. Implementors then can use com.SoftWoehr.util.verbosity to handle verbose output.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1.1.1 $
Author:
$Author: jwoehr $
See Also:
verbosity

Method Summary
 void announce(java.lang.String message)
          Say something if the object is in verbose mode, be silent otherwise.

          Returns true if instance is in verbose mode.
 void setVerbose(boolean b)
          Sets true or resets false verbose mode.
